report.name: Name of the Report
report.descr: Description of the report for its content and how to install it
report.numrow: Number of rows to display for that form. 0 for unlimited
report.idquery: name of the query associate with the form, if their is not saved query enter zero
report.header: HTML template for the header of the Report
report.row: HTML template for the row of the Report
report.footer: HTML template for the footer of the Report
report.recprow: Number of records that need to be proceed for each row template
